snippet.title: Japanese government warns Baidu IME is spying on users
snippet.description: The Japanese government has issued a directive to stop using the Baidu Input Method Editor (IME) when writing confidential documents due to concerns about spying.

snippet.title: Indian outsourcers are tweaking their model and innovating to stay ahead
snippet.description: Read about six ways India's IT companies are finding new ways to distinguish themselves from the herd.

snippet.title: Indian IT suffering from a shortage of innovative management specialists
snippet.description: The dearth of innovative IT managers who can think critically is hampering India's growth in the consulting partner market.

snippet.title: Mumbai lures product startups away from IT services hub Bangalore
snippet.description: Read an insider's view of Mumbai's tech startup environment, which he notes is different from the IT services ecosystem in Bangalore.

snippet.title: Agile adoption in Asia faces tough obstacles
snippet.description: Claudio Caballero looks at why the high level of interest in agile methodologies in Asia isn't resulting in a slew of agile contracts.

snippet.title: Pirated copies of Windows OS in China prone to security issues
snippet.description: PCs running on pirated copies of Windows wide open to malware, says Microsoft. The company has launched an anti-piracy campaign to address such risks.

snippet.title: 10+ challenges facing the 'international' CIO
snippet.description: IT leaders who are responsible for international operations face some extra issues, not all of which are tech-related. Here are some of the concerns you may encounter.

snippet.title: Web design themes: Create a vintage look and feel
snippet.description: Ryan Boudreaux illustrates some of the elements that come together to create a vintage, or retro-themed, web design and shares some tips for finding resources and inspiration.

snippet.title: Cosplay and Japanese culture at AnimeCon in Louisville
snippet.description: The Louisville Free Public Library's AnimeCon for teens featured sessions on the history of the Samurai, manga jewelry making, comic book drawing, and more.

snippet.title: World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria beta first look
snippet.description: Mists of Pandaria is an upcoming expansion to World of Warcraft. Wally Bahny provides highlights and screenshots from the beta version.
